items.title: Euro zone inflation rises to hotter-than-expected 2.1% in August
items.description: Economists polled by Reuters had expected the rate to remain unchanged from July, at 2%.

items.title: Trump keeps threatening to punish Putin. Here's what's holding him back
items.description: U.S. President Donald Trump says he'll punish Russia if Moscow doesn't agree to peace talks with Ukraine. Yet, he hasn't pushed the button, so far.

items.title: Here's how the U.S. Open's signature Honey Deuce cocktail price stacks up against inflation
items.description: CNBC compared the Honey Deuce's price growth since 2015 against the CPI basket.

items.title: Core inflation rose to 2.9% in July, highest since February
items.description: The PCE report today was expected to show core inflation at 2.9% and headline inflation at 2.6%.

items.title: Higher inflation and unemployment cast shadow over Europe's biggest economy
items.description: A hotter-than-expected inflation reading for Germany came on the same day that figures showed unemployed jumped in August.
